Bring <S%G71><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Adultery <S%G3430><s%> Having Been Taken, <S%G2638><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Set <S%G2476><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Midst, <S%G3319><s%>

They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Was Taken <S%G2638><s%> In The Very Act <S%G1888><s%> Committing Adultery. <S%G3431><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> Now In <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Commanded <S%G1781><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> To Be Stoned : <S%G3036><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Sayest Thou? <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> But This <S%G1161><s%> They Said <S%G3004><s%> Tempting <S%G3985><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Have <S%G2192><s%> To Accuse <S%G2723><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424><s%> Jesus <S%G2736><s%> Having Stooped Down, <S%G2955><s%> With His <S%G3588><s%> Finger <S%G1147><s%> Wrote <S%G1125><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground. <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G5613><s%> But As <S%G1161><s%> They Continued <S%G1961><s%> Asking <S%G2065><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Having Lifted Up Himself <S%G352><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Sinless One <S%G361><s%> Among You <S%G5216><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> ' At <S%G1909><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Let Him Cast. <S%G906><s%>

To No One) <S%G3762><s%> Have Been Under Bondage <S%G1398><s%> Never; <S%G4455><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Sayest, <S%G3754><s%> Free <S%G1658><s%> Ye Shall Become? <S%G1096><s%>
